mapper.select: SELECT sonbid.OID, sonbid.jkje , sonbid.productStatus, sonbid.jkll, sonbid.jkmc, sonbid.financetransfertype, sonbid.debitCreditOID, sonbid.term, t2.yhnum syqs , t2.allNum zqs, sonbid.biddingOID FROM (SELECT WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID AS OID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanProductRateInfoID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.financetransfertype AS financetransfertype, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.productStatus AS productStatus, PAY_DebitCredit.outMemberOID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.debitCreditOID AS debitCreditOID, IFNULL(WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.debtLoanNumber, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanNumber) jkmc, ROUND(WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo.yearRate * 100, 2) jkll, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.biddingAmount jkje, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID biddingOID, WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo.term, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanNumber FROM WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo, PAY_DebitCredit, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning, WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning WHERE WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID = WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping.mainOID AND WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID = #{OID} AND WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping.contentOID = WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID AND WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo.OID = WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanProductRateInfoID GROUP BY WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID) sonbid LEFT JOIN PAY_DebitCredit ON sonbid.OID = PAY_DebitCredit.businessOID JOIN WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning mcr on mcr.loanNumber=sonbid.loanNumber and mcr.financetransfertype='normal' LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(if(state='finish', 1, 0)) AS yhnum, COUNT(*) AS allNum, businessOID, memberOID FROM PAY_RepayPlan GROUP BY businessOID ) AS t2 ON t2.memberOID=mcr.memberOID GROUP BY sonbid.OID ORDER BY SUBSTRING_INDEX(jkmc, '-', -1) DESC limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(sonbid.OID) FROM ( SELECT WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID AS OID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanProductRateInfoID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.financetransfertype AS financetransfertype, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.productStatus AS productStatus, PAY_DebitCredit.outMemberOID, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.debitCreditOID AS debitCreditOID, IFNULL( WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.debtLoanNumber, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanNumber ) jkmc, ROUND( WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo.yearRate * 100, 2 ) jkll, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.biddingAmount jkje, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID biddingOID, WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo.term, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanNumber FROM WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo, PAY_DebitCredit, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning, WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping, WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning WHERE WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID = WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping.mainOID AND WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainRuning.OID = #{OID} AND WEBP2P_PackageMainContentMapping.contentOID = WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID AND WEBP2P_LoanProductRateInfo.OID = WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.loanProductRateInfoID GROUP BY WEBP2P_PackageBiddingMainContentRuning.OID ) sonbid
